name: Prison of Illusion
description:
Hi, i’m Andrea Di Bartolo, 3d Artist for StrangeFire games (Shoppe Keep series)
this time i'm presenting you a game a bit different from my usual arcade-driven games...

Prison of Illusion is a top-down game based on player choices, try to escape this mysterious prison walking through the right paths! Be careful, The game lies!

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

E to talk/interact
